sentence: Whats brown and runs around your garden? your fence.
explanation: a barrier enclosing an area of land
first_new_sentence: The homeowners installed a fence around their property to ensure privacy.
second_new_sentence: The dog jumped over the fence to chase the squirrel.

sentence: What did the dad say when his daughter gave him gravel for his birthday? thanks for sediments
explanation: solid material that settles to the bottom of a liquid
first_new_sentence: The sediments in the riverbed accumulated over thousands of years.
second_new_sentence: Scientists studied the sediments to understand the areas geological history.

sentence: Q: why cant the bankrupt cowboy complain? a: he has got no beef.
first_new_sentence: The farmer raised beef cattle for the market.
second_new_sentence: The two friends had a disagreement, but they decided to clear the beef between them.
